edu.ncsu.csc216.airport_customs.arriving_passengers

Class Passenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.airport_customs.arriving_passengers.Passenger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Diplomat, Resident, Visitor

    public abstract class Passenger
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that is used to create different types of passengers. This class contains common variables between all the different passenger types.
    Version:
    1.06 - Feb. 8, 2015
    Author:
    jaliddl2 - Jesse Liddle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Passenger(int arrivalTime, int processTime)
      Parent constructor for the children Passenger types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Passenger

        public Passenger(int arrivalTime,
                 int processTime)
        Parent constructor for the children Passenger types. This constructor takes an int for both the arrivalTime and processTime.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - the amount of time it will take that passenger to arrive at the desk.
        processTime - the amount of time it will take that passenger to process.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the process time or arrival time is less than 0.

    • Method Detail

      • getArrivalTime

        public int getArrivalTime()
        Gets the arrivalTime of the passenger.
        Returns:
        arrivalTime The amount of time it will take the passenger to arrive at the gate.

      • getWaitTime

        public int getWaitTime()
        Gets the waitTime of the passenger.
        Returns:
        waitTime The amount of time the passenger has to wait before getting to the front of the line.

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(int time)
        Sets the wait time for the passenger.
        Parameters:
        time - The amount of time it will take for the line in front of the passenger to clear.

      • getProcessTime

        public int getProcessTime()
        Gets the processTime of the passenger.
        Returns:
        processTime The amount of time it will take the passenger to process at the desk.

      • isWaitingInCustomsLine

        public boolean isWaitingInCustomsLine()
        Gets if the passenger is currently waiting in line or not.
        Returns:
        waitingProcess True if the passenger is currently waiting to be processed.

      • removeFromWaitinLine

        public void removeFromWaitinLine()
        Removes the passenger from the line.

      • setLineIndex

        public void setLineIndex(int index)
        Sets and updates the position that the passenger is in line.
        Parameters:
        index - The new position of the passenger.

      • getInLine

        public abstract void getInLine(CustomsDesk[] line)
        Sets the passenger to waiting in a customs desk line.
        Parameters:
        line - The line that the passenger will join.

      • getColor

        public abstract java.awt.Color getColor()
        Gets the color of the passenger.
        Returns:
        c The color of the current passenger.

      • getLineChoice

        public abstract int getLineChoice()
        Gets the line choice of the passenger.
        Returns:
        lineChoice Is the line the passenger picked to enter.
